daily_fact: The Department of Sanitation is actively helping New Yorkers clear snow borough by borough, showcasing the city's commitment to community support and resilience during winter challenges.
topline_md: In New York City, a tragic cold snap has resulted in 13 homeless deaths despite outreach efforts, while transportation disruptions continue with NJ to NYC train delays and a blocked tunnel; additionally, a cable incident in Brooklyn and fatal fires in the boroughs highlight ongoing safety concerns.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Code Blue alert issued as 13 people found dead outside in NYC amid cold weather. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NJ to NYC trains delayed by 45 minutes due to a blocked tunnel. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxQWXg1SmRkSncwaWc4TWNLWmwyWjBzQ2ZuTTZ6cnJDdXBncWE0QmZzNXNTUWdQNFA1NHdRaWZVLWxHeXViZk94R19rajIwc25lUGE5UnFKOF9OTGJ6OGRva1FhVW1jb2tMeGVEbE8tRE1TLU1HMno2d2Jwa2FXcEZHVE1UbENsZk9LSmNvalFjNVgyUHRKNFpUeXZEY0pGZVR6RVVyOHJ3?oc=5)
